name: shazam_songs_get_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool shazam.
Tool description: Identify any song. Discover, artists, lyrics, videos & playlists to create a song detector site/application such as shazam.com
API description: Get mapping id information between systems to use with other endpoints.

is_id.description: The value of the 'id' field returned by the /search endpoint on Shazam.
